title: Susannah handwritten logo by Underware
content:
Hi. I really like the Susannah logo (See Attached) and i’m looking for a similar font. Also the Letter Setter (See Attached) isn’t to bad aswell. Anything in the same range as these two would be good. Thanks for any help you can give me...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Susannah.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/typophile.com/files/Susannah.jpg) | 30.25 KB |
| [letterSetter.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/typophile.com/files/letterSetter.jpg) | 26.44 KB |

 [‹ (x) Handwritten script in website - Angelina {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34206 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) sans in agenda - News Gothic {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34209 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aevri

comments.content:
You might try Bello from [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.underware.nl/) and the SignPainter-Kit from [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.houseind.com/).

Steff
thanks! There good but i’m after something a little bit different to those. Anymore in mind???

tim, billabong is very nice!

a few more suggestions:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/brody-sh/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/brody-sh/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/brody-sh/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/challenge/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/challenge/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/challenge/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-pooper-black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-pooper-black/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ihof/p22-pooper-black/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/amorinda/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/kari/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/lasalle-sb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/lasalle-sb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/lasalle-sb/")

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/malbeck/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/malbeck/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/malbeck/")

Steff

That logo is custom lettered by Underware, so I guess Bello is close.  
But you should also check out [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107033522/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home), where Alejandro Paul and co. sell their script fonts.

And the other is lettered by House, but you must know that.

Tim
Yeah the Susannah logos from Underware and we tried Bello but it’s not suitable. But thanks for that link, found some good ones on there that really helped me out.
Cool thanks, I will take a look.
